code: import React from'react';import ReactPlayerLoader from'@brightcove/react-player-loader';import useStyles from'./styles';import{BRIGHTCOVE_ACCOUNT,BRIGHTCOVE_PLAYER,BRIGHTCOVE_GENERIC_PLAYER}from'../../public/constants';var VideoPlayer=function VideoPlayer(props){var videoId=props.videoId;var classes=useStyles();console.log('process.env :',process.env.NODE_ENV);return React.createElement(ReactPlayerLoader,{accountId:BRIGHTCOVE_ACCOUNT,videoId:videoId,playerId:process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'?BRIGHTCOVE_GENERIC_PLAYER:BRIGHTCOVE_PLAYER,attrs:{className:classes.player},options:{autoplay:false}});};export default VideoPlayer;
